description: A freeware metroidvania game created by Maddy Thorson chronicling the travels of an adventurous egg.

v1.1-beta.description:
### Changes
- Modified location/item names to be more accurate
- Changed some non-useful progression items to use `progression_skip_balancing`
- Updated to match Archipelago 0.6.0

### Credits
- Thank you to Ladybunne for these changes!

### Installation
1. Download the zip file attached to this post
2. Extract all the files into a new folder 
3. Edit `ArchipelagoConnectionInfo.ini` with your desired host/port/slot
4. Launch `AnUntitledStory_Randomizer_Beta_V1.0a.exe`
5. Select the Archipelago option in the menu
v1.1-beta.title: v1.1-beta

v1.3-beta.description:
## Changes
* Fixes some logic errors in SkySand, BlackCastle, and FireCage
* Updates gm-apclientpp.dll to 0.4.9-3, enabling compressed websocket support
* Adds a manifest file to the APWorld for 0.7.0 compatibility

(Note: The game .exe was renamed in this update, but has not been modified since v1.2-beta.)

## Installation
1. Download the zip file attached to this post
2. Extract all the files into a new folder
3. Edit ArchipelagoConnectionInfo.ini with your desired host/port/slot
4. Launch AnUntitledStory.Randomizer.Beta.V2.0a.exe
5. Select the Archipelago option in the menu

## Known Issues
* Having items in starting inventory is not supported and will break later received items. Instead, it's recommended to plando the items into early locations such as "First Item" and "Bird Temple".
* To play on multiple different slots concurrently, you will need to either have multiple copies of the game in different folders (recommended), or delete your UntitledSave4 and ItemRando4.ini files each time you change slots.
* Some users have had an issue with the game becoming unresponsive upon collecting their first item, and on loading the game afterward. This appears to be related to a bug in the base game which appeared recently on newer devices. If you encounter this, let us know on the Archipelago Discord thread.
v1.3-beta.title: v1.3-beta

v1.4-beta.description:
## Changes
* Fixes apworld logic errors in FarFall, SkyTown, BlackCastle, RainbowDive, and NightWalk. See #5 for details.
(Game .zip has not been modified.)

## Installation
1. Download the zip file attached to this post
2. Extract all the files into a new folder
3. Edit ArchipelagoConnectionInfo.ini with your desired host/port/slot
4. Launch AnUntitledStory.Randomizer.Beta.V2.0a.exe
5. Select the Archipelago option in the menu

## Credits
* Thank you to @atrum32 for the updates!

## Known Issues
* Having items in starting inventory is not supported and will break later received items. Instead, it's recommended to plando the items into early locations such as "First Item" and "Bird Temple".
* To play on multiple different slots concurrently, you will need to either have multiple copies of the game in different folders (recommended), or delete your UntitledSave4 and ItemRando4.ini files each time you change slots.
* Some users have had an issue with the game becoming unresponsive upon collecting their first item, and on loading the game afterward. This appears to be related to a bug in the base game which appeared recently on newer devices. If you encounter this, let us know on the Archipelago Discord thread.
v1.4-beta.title: v1.4-beta

v1.5-beta.description:
## Changes
* Adds several new yaml options, including DeathLink, difficulty, required gold orbs, arcade checks, and hard logic
* Project has officially been ported to [GM 8.2](https://gm82.cherry-treehouse.com/) for increased stability and functionality
* Fixed the bug that would make the game crash on loading for some devices
* You can now hold Escape to advance more quickly through popups
* Enabled gamepad support (see pause menu for setup)
* Misc logic fixes

## Installation
1. Download the zip file attached to this post
2. Extract all the files into a new folder
3. Edit ArchipelagoConnectionInfo.ini with your desired host/port/slot
4. Launch the .exe file in the extracted folder
5. Select the Archipelago option in the menu

## Credits
* Thanks again to @atrum32 for all the help!

## Known Issues
* Having items in starting inventory is not supported and will break later received items. Instead, it's recommended to plando the items into early locations such as "First Item" and "Bird Temple".
* To play on multiple different slots concurrently, you will need to either have multiple copies of the game in different folders (recommended), or delete your UntitledSave4 and ItemRando4.ini files each time you change slots.
v1.5-beta.title: v1.5-beta
